Key Match Events: Mahmoud Al-Aswad scored the opening goal in the 7th minute
Daleho Irandust and Pablo Sabbag scored the second and third goals respectively in the 76th and 90+6th minutes
Elias Hadaya made several crucial saves for Syria
India's Sahal Abdul Samad tested Syria's goalkeeper Hadaya in the 28th minute
India's Naorem Mahesh Singh added dynamism to their attack in the second half
Pre-Game Insights: India head coach Manolo Márquez made seven changes from the previous match
Syria's head coach José Lana rotated all 11 players from the previous match
Post-Match Reflections: India head coach Manolo Márquez expressed dissatisfaction with the first half and satisfaction with the second half
Syria head coach José Lana expressed happiness with the team's performance and the young squad
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hon'ble Chief Minister of Telangana presented the winners' trophy to Syria
Syria captain Mahmoud Al-Mawas was named the Syed Abdul Rahim Player of the Tournament
Others: The match was played at GMC Balayogi Gachibowli Stadium in Hyderabad
India's starting lineup included Gurpreet Singh Sandhu in goal
